overview: The Rolling Stones are arguably one of the biggest rock and roll bands of our time, influencing society and music in ways that will never be forgotten. What started out as two old friends bumping into each other on the platform of Dartford station in Kent, The Rolling Stones became the face of rock and roll. What became a huge success both in music and business, started as a few guys trying to make a few extra pounds and while showing their passion for rhythm and blues. We take a long at their journey to Rock Royalty!
tagline: The Rolling Stones are arguably one of the biggest rock and roll bands of our time, influencing society and music in ways that will never be forgotten. We take a long at their journey to Rock Royalty!
title: The Rolling Stones: Rock Royalty
